alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Carroll County through 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodlawn, or near Hillsville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galax... Hillsville... Dugspur... and Woodlawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
